Reviews.Title: “Not bad for the great deal I got.”

Reviews.Content: hotel package bought travel website included eight nights nonstop airfare leaving friday returning sunday based rate airfare 50 night price half rate deal hotel conveniently located blocks termini super seedy streets immediately adjacent station street lovely st maria maggiore half hour stroll straight top spanish steps single similar ive paris london clean decent repair bed comfortable private bathroomshower clean plenty hot water floor wireless internet signal people floors networking lobby hotel run asians staff perfectly amiable language wasnt main complaint started cleaning am loudly sleeping required earplugs breakfast included deal basic pastries cereal cheese sandwich meat coffee juice machines jams etc tv didnt channels wasnt rome watch tv bothered inquire overall satisfied price
